code:
import*as React from'react';import setRef from'./setRef';export default function useForkRef(refA,refB){/**
   * This will create a new function if the ref props change and are defined.
   * This means react will call the old forkRef with `null` and the new forkRef
   * with the ref. Cleanup naturally emerges from this behavior
   */return React.useMemo(function(){if(refA==null&&refB==null){return null;}return function(refValue){setRef(refA,refValue);setRef(refB,refValue);};},[refA,refB]);}
